sample_responses.user_permissions: User permissions in Visage are managed through the administrative interface where you can assign different roles and access levels to users based on their responsibilities.
sample_responses.system_requirements: Visage 7 requires specific hardware and software configurations including adequate RAM, storage, and network bandwidth for optimal performance.
sample_responses.pacs_integration: PACS integration involves configuring DICOM settings, network connections, and ensuring proper communication protocols between systems.
sample_responses.database_backup: Database backups in Visage RIS should be performed regularly using the built-in backup utilities or automated scheduling features.
sample_responses.pacs_vs_ris: Visage PACS handles image storage and viewing while Visage RIS manages patient information, scheduling, and workflow processes.
sample_responses.login_troubleshooting: Login issues can be resolved by checking user credentials, network connectivity, and system status indicators.
